attributes.action: Cancel showing birth certificate /passport to get a job
attributes.additional_details:
I'm fed up people asking for my passport , birth certificate
proof to work in the UK.
I should only have to give them my national insurance number
I was born HERE.... ENGLAND
attributes.background:
Change the rules so people born in the UK only need to show their 
national insurance number
People who come to live /work in this country not born in the UK should show all paperwork

rejection.details: It's not clear how employers would be able to check the identity of a new employee by asking only for the employee's National Insurance number.
